price: (Soro abͻfoͻ no bεkyea wͻn sε): “Asomdwiε nka mo wͻ mo aboterε a monyaeε no ho.” Awie pa paa fie ni.
arabic: سَلَٰمٌ عَلَيۡكُم بِمَا صَبَرۡتُمۡۚ فَنِعۡمَ عُقۡبَى ٱلدَّارِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: salāmun ʿalaykum bimā ṣabartum faniʿ'ma ʿuq'bā al-dāri
